message: Let's split the money evenly to start. Fair is fair, right?
Let's be practical, Alice.  I'm feeling the inflation pinch more. I'll take a bit more to even things out.
Okay, let's try this. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I still need a decent share to make up for the inflation.
Look, Alice, we're running out of time, and this back and forth isn't helping anyone.  I'll meet you in the middle from my last offer.
